title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and stream models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; synchronous and async APIs for chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and embed inside Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template pre-wired to Ollama REST API; dark/light themes, Docker ready.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama; use local models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model auto-pull.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF Q&A, voice chat, function-calling, RAG, fine-tune, LangGraph agents, etc.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made docker-compose stacks: CPU, NVIDIA, AMD, Open-WebUI, Postgres memory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run any Ollama model on your vault for summarization, translation, or Q&A.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package: zero-dependency TypeScript client for Ollama REST API with full streaming support.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: lightweight Python client for Ollama with sync/async APIs and Pydantic models.

title: ollama-reddit-discussion
summary: Reddit thread discussing Ollama v0.1.10 release notes: new function-calling support, updated models, performance gains.

title: ollama-hackernews-launch
summary: Hacker News launch discussion for Ollama v0.1.0: lightweight local LLM runner, comparisons to llama.cpp, Docker usage.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Streamlit template app that streams Ollama chat completions with session memory and model selector.
